cumulated.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)), wcel(c1, cdm(citg1))), wceq(cfv(citg1, co(c0, cof(cmin), c1)), co(cfv(citg1, c0), cmin, cfv(citg1, c1))))

comment: The integral of a difference of two simple functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Aug-2014.)
